extensionDescription.message: Enhance your reading experience of JW official site and Watchtower Online Library (WOL) with Refined JW

popupNote.message: Note this extension only activates when you visit JW.org or the Watchtower Online Library (WOL)

highlightNote.message: Currently highlight support is very limited, you can only create highlights within the same paragraph or verse.

seenIndicatorTooltip.message: Click to delete current time and seen indicator

hintNote.message: This popup and button has been added by Refined JW Chrome Extension, it is not part of the official content of the page. If you encounter a problem, please report it on the GitHub issues page.

subtitleInfoBox.message: Click on any sentence to jump the video

popoverSelectionInTranscriptionLost.message:
Please notice that as Transcription section is unofficial your highlights will be lost when you leave the page.

Click on this popover to dismiss it

popoverSelectionInHomePageLost.message:
Please notice as this page is dynamic your highlight will be lost when you leave the page.

We strongly recommend that you navigate to $2 page before adding your highlight.

Click on this popover to dismiss it

goToSearch.message: Go to search or query the selected text

goToToday.message: Navigate to current day or week

extractQuotes.message: Pin quotes extracted from current selection

goToPrevious.message: Navigate to previous article, week or day

goToNext.message: Navigate to next article, week or day

increasePlaybackSpeed.message: Increase playback speed of current audio or video

decreasePlaybackSpeed.message: Decrease playback speed of current audio or video

jumpForward.message: Jump audio to next verse, paragraph or section. If not possible then skip forward by 5 seconds

jumpBackward.message: Jump audio to previous verse, paragraph or section. If not possible then skip backward by 5 seconds
